Question
========

We assume that all birth months are equally likely. Marieke was born in March and she will meet four strangers in a meeting. What is the probability that all four strangers were born as Marieke?

Answerlist
----------

* 1/12
* 4/12
* 4/144
* 1/20736

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1/12: Incorrect
* 4/12: Incorrect
* 4/144: Incorrect
* 1/20736: Correct
